about-code-for-ftl.title: About Code for Fort Lauderdale
about-code-for-ftl.description: Code for Fort Lauderdale is a Code for America brigade advocating for open data from local Fort Lauderdale governments and creating apps and resources with it.

code-of-conduct.title: Code of Conduct
code-of-conduct.description: Code for America Code of Conduct

get-started-with-civic-hacking.title: Get Started with Civic Hacking
get-started-with-civic-hacking.description: Check out projects, open issues and ideas to get you started with civic hacking

civic-hacking-101.title: Civic Hacking 101
civic-hacking-101.description: Civic hacking is for everyone, learn how you can contribute to your city.
